casebody.data:
LEMONS
v.
STATE 2018-0002 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 9, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW O'Donnell, J., dissents and would accept the cause on proposition of law No. II. Kennedy and Fischer, JJ., dissent. William A. Klatt, J., of the Tenth District Court of Appeals, sitting for DeGenaro, J.
